TOC

Tools for Teams

A few weeks ago, I asked teams about what tools they would recommend for other teams. Here are the results of the discussion on Facebook Group FLL: Share & Learn . If you would like to share any more, send an email to team@ev3lessons.com.

Google Calendar - Team Scheduling
Google Group - Team Mailing Lists
Google Drive - Shared Team Files
Trello - Team organization
Redbooth - Taking Notes
OneNote and OneDrive - Notes and Shared Documents
Slack - Tracking Progress, Documenting
EV3Lessons Robot Game Scorer - Tracking Scores
Basecamp - Project Management
Fleep - Messaging
Whatapp - Team communication
iMovie
iBrainstorm

Notice: This page will be removed in the upcoming months. Do not worry as the resource continues to be avaliable at FLL Tutorials!
